creator: admin@araknotech.net
text:
I configured apache on my new debian sarge server and I saw that when I send a 
request for a ServerName not present in VirtualHosts, server doesn't show the 
files that are in DocumentRoot set in the main configuration, but the 
DocumentRoot of the first VirtualHost. 
apache version 1.3.33 installed with Debian package, but I see that it does the 
same even compiling it, and even on a Fedora system.
Thank you.

Virtual host matching is not working as you expected.  Check the docs at 

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/vhosts/index.html

Use a user-support list/newsgroup if that doesn't resolve it.

http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users
creator: trawick@apache.org
